description:
Zest is a Demon that was created and served to Zolgear as his maid, she was sent by the Demon Lord Faction to serve as a scout alongside Lars. After the defeat of Zolgear, she temporarily served Sheila, the mother of Lucia and Maria having lost her original purpose and complied with the demands of the Moderate Faction. She ultimately serves Basara as she was tied to Basara in the Master-Servant Contract in a manner similar to Mio and Yuki but instead uses Sheila`s nature.
Source: Shinmai Maou no Keiyakusha Wiki
name: Zest
